thread.section_title: Eagle Optics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Eagle Optics | www.eagleoptics.com
thread.title: M. Dean
thread.title_full: Eagle Optics reviewed by M. Dean

author: M. Dean
title: M. Dean
text: Phoned in order on Friday and received binoculars on Saturday (no expedited shipment requested). As a novice user, I received very credible support (frank discussion on what an additional $140 would provide in value for the same product line). A small gift was added without asking (I must have said the "secret word")!
